summary: An email from an American Express Special Investigations Manager to an unidentified recipient regarding a previously discussed matter about Mr. Epstein's American Express accounts. The sender states they have filed a Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) and offers to provide a copy of the SAR and supporting documentation.

persons.name: Mr. Epstein
persons.context: The email references a prior conversation about activity on his American Express accounts and indicates a SAR has been filed.

events.title: American Express SAR Filing Notification
events.description: An American Express Special Investigations Manager emails an unidentified recipient to notify them that a Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) has been filed regarding Mr. Epstein's accounts and offers to provide the documentation.

keyFacts: American Express filed a Suspicious Activity Report (SAR) regarding activity on Jeffrey Epstein's accounts.
The communication is from the American Express Financial Intelligence Unit, Special Investigations team.
The email is a follow-up to a prior conversation about Epstein's American Express accounts.
The sender offers to provide the SAR and supporting documentation to the recipient.
The document indicates ongoing financial scrutiny of Epstein's activities by American Express as of January 2020.
